UI helper methods

Methods

Name Description
hideMask (
  • selector
)

Removes a overlay from an Element on the page
hideMask (
  • instanceId
  • selector
)

Removes a overlay from an Element on the page
init (
  • containerConfig
)
setTitle (
  • title
)

Sets the title of the app as shown in the browser. Depending on the container HTML, this method may do nothing if the container has not been configured properly or else the container provider does not allow Title's to be set.
showMask (
  • selector
  • showLoading
)

Display an ovarlay over an Element on the page
showMask (
  • instanceId
  • selector
  • showLoading
)

Display an ovarlay over an Element on the page
updateHeight (
  • height
)

For secure apps, this method updates the size of the iframe that contains the app. Note: It is recommended that app developers call this method anytime Elements are added or removed from the DOM
  • hideMask

  • init static

)

Removes a overlay from an Element on the page

Parameters:

    The Element or selector to an Element that currently contains the loader

setTitle (
  • title
)

Defined in sdk/src/ui.js:163

Sets the title of the app as shown in the browser. Depending on the container HTML, this method may do nothing if the container has not been configured properly or else the container provider does not allow Title's to be set.

Parameters:

  • title String

    The title of the app

showMask (
  • selector
  • showLoading
)

Defined in sdk/src/ui.js:187

Display an ovarlay over an Element on the page

Parameters:

  • selector String | Element

    The Element or selector to an Element over which to display the loader

  • showLoading Bool

    Display a loading icon

  • instanceId
  • selector
  • showLoading
) static

Defined in sdk/src/ui.js:345

Display an ovarlay over an Element on the page

Parameters:

  • instanceId String

    The Instance ID of the app

  • selector String | Element

    The Element or selector to an Element over which to display the loader

  • showLoading Bool

    Display a loading icon

updateHeight (
  • height
)

Defined in sdk/src/ui.js:197

For secure apps, this method updates the size of the iframe that contains the app. Note: It is recommended that app developers call this method anytime Elements are added or removed from the DOM

Parameters:

  • height Int

    The height of the app

F2

An open & free framework created for building financial applications.

Enabling smarter financial applications

F2 is governed by its Advisory Board, and maintained by Markit On Demand on GitHub. F2 is licensed under the Apache 2.0 License.
